# o2ools

Tools to process the results of
[`outbreaker2`](https://github.com/reconhub/outbreaker2).

## Installation

Install the package from
[CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/o2ools/index.html):

``` r
install.packages("o2ools")
library(o2ools)
```

Or the development version from GitHub:

``` r
devtools::install_github("cygei/o2ools")
```

## Information

The inference of transmission chains from genomic, epidemiological and
contact data is central to outbreak investigations.
[`outbreaker2`](https://github.com/reconhub/outbreaker2) and other
popular models use Bayesian inference to reconstruct who infected whom.
However, the results of these models are difficult to interpret and
visualise. `o2ools` provides tools to analyse and visualise the results
of `outbreaker2`. To get started, check the package
[vignette](https://cygei.github.io/o2ools/articles/o2ools.html).

# Package index

## All functions

- [`augment_linelist()`](https://cygei.github.io/o2ools/reference/augment_linelist.md)
  : Append summaries of outbreaker results to a linelist
- [`filter_chain()`](https://cygei.github.io/o2ools/reference/filter_chain.md)
  : Filter chain by parameter threshold
- [`get_Ri()`](https://cygei.github.io/o2ools/reference/get_Ri.md) :
  Compute case reproduction numbers (Ri) from outbreaker2 chains
- [`get_accuracy()`](https://cygei.github.io/o2ools/reference/get_accuracy.md)
  : Calculate the accuracy of outbreak reconstruction
- [`get_consensus()`](https://cygei.github.io/o2ools/reference/get_consensus.md)
  : Get the consensus transmission tree
- [`get_entropy()`](https://cygei.github.io/o2ools/reference/get_entropy.md)
  : Compute the entropy of transmission trees
- [`get_si()`](https://cygei.github.io/o2ools/reference/get_si.md) :
  Compute the serial interval (si) from transmission trees
- [`get_trees()`](https://cygei.github.io/o2ools/reference/get_trees.md)
  : Extract posterior transmission trees
- [`identify()`](https://cygei.github.io/o2ools/reference/identify.md) :
  Replace integers in outbreaker2 output with unique identifiers
- [`linelist`](https://cygei.github.io/o2ools/reference/linelist.md) :
  Simulated linelist with group labels
- [`out`](https://cygei.github.io/o2ools/reference/out.md) : outbreaker2
  toy dataset
- [`sample.outbreaker_chains()`](https://cygei.github.io/o2ools/reference/sample.outbreaker_chains.md)
  : Sample rows from an outbreaker_chains object
- [`ttable()`](https://cygei.github.io/o2ools/reference/ttable.md) :
  Compute the transmission contingency table

  analyses](https://cygei.github.io/o2ools/articles/extended_analyses.md):

  o2ools](https://cygei.github.io/o2ools/articles/o2ools.md):
